scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n backend,worker,frontend -c green,magenta,cyan "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix backend run worker" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
